languages.text: "Еретики заслуживают разоблачения и смерти. Даже среди нас".

traits.locale_text: "Еретики заслуживают разоблачения и смерти. Даже среди нас".

languages.text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."
languages.original_text: "Еретики заслуживают разоблачения и смерти. Даже среди нас".

traits.locale_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even among us."
"The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even among us."
"The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."
"The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

"The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

languages.text: 「異端者はさらし上げて処刑するのがふさわしい。私たちの中にいるとしても、同じ事です」
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者はさらし上げて処刑するのがふさわしい。私たちの中にいるとしても、同じ事です」

languages.text: “异端分子都应该被揪出来处决，包括我们身边的异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: “异端分子都应该被揪出来处决，包括我们身边的异端分子。”

languages.text: « Les hérétiques doivent être exposés au grand jour et exécutés. Même s'ils font partie des nôtres. »
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques doivent être exposés au grand jour et exécutés. Même s'ils font partie des nôtres. »

languages.text: «Los herejes merecen ser revelados y ejecutados. Incluso los que están entre nosotros».
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes merecen ser revelados y ejecutados. Incluso los que están entre nosotros».

languages.text: "Die Ketzer hatten es verdient, enttarnt und hingerichtet zu werden. Auch die aus unseren Reihen."
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzer hatten es verdient, enttarnt und hingerichtet zu werden. Auch die aus unseren Reihen."

languages.text: "İfşa ve infaz edilmek, kâfirlere müstahak. Aramızda olanlar da buna dâhil."
languages.original_text: "The heretics deserve to be exposed and executed. Even those among us."

traits.locale_text: "İfşa ve infaz edilmek kâfirlere müstahak. Aramızda olsalar bile."
